name: Egg Warrior
description:
Travelling while waiting to reach your destination? 

No Need to worry, you have an "Egg Warrior” Time your egg to jump up through obstacles as you collecting as many Easter Eggs as you can.

Egg Warrior is a Fun game where you tap the screen to Jump up eggs through the obstacles while collecting Easter Eggs. Let's see how many Easter eggs you can score.

This is a game of timing, so tap and make the eggs jump at the right time. Remember, you have three eggs to choose from at the start of the game.

Have fun and share it with your friends too.
